# Shapechange (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] ([[Polymorph Spells|polymorph]])

**Level:** [[Animal (Domain)|Animal 9]], [[9th Level Druid Spells|Druid 9]], [[9th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 9]], [[9th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 9]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 18th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 18]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F (jade circlet worth 1,500 gp)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 341

This spell allows you to take the form of a wide variety of creatures. This spell can function as *[[Alter Self (Spell)|alter self]], [[Beast Shape IV (Spell)|beast shape IV]], [[Elemental Body IV (Spell)|elemental body IV]]*, *[[Form of the Dragon III (Spell)|form of the dragon III]], [[Giant Form II (Spell)|giant form II]],* and *[[Plant Shape III (Spell)|plant shape III]]* depending on what form you take. You can change form once each round as a free action. The change takes place either immediately before your regular action or immediately after it, but not during the action.
